channel.title: (TestScape) Adding New Shops?
channel.description:
I need help adding new shops.
I've added King Arthur to autospawn.cfg and that was no problem. [code]spawn = 251 3250 3423 0 0 0 0 0 4 Dragon Weapons King Arthur[/code] I've added my shop which I can open from an command but not King Arthur. [code]shop = 40 Dragon Weapons 2 2 1149 999 3140 999 4087 999 4585 999 1187 999 1215 999 1249 999 1305 999 1377 999 1434 999 3204 999 4587 999 6739 999 7158 999[/code] I've added the code in client.java [code]if (NPCID == 251) { /*Dragon Equips*/ PutNPCCoords = true; openUpShop(40); }[/code]
Is there anything else I need to add or change? When I click on him, nothing happens.
Server IP - sugerscape.sytes.net Server Port - 43594
I put my server info incase someone wants to see an example.

item.title: (TestScape) Adding New Shops?
item.dc:creator: @hermitblade hermitblade
item.description:
@hermitblade wrote:

Yes I did.

[code]case 155: //first Click npc
int NPCSlot = (misc.HexToInt(inStream.buffer, 0, packetSize) / 1000);
int NPCID = server.npcHandler.npcs[NPCSlot].npcType;
faceNPC(NPCSlot);
boolean FishingGo = false;
boolean PutNPCCoords = false;

			if (NPCID == 309) { /*Lure From Lure & Bait - Any Sea*/
				if (IsItemInBag(309) == true && IsItemInBag(314) == true) {
					FishingGo = true;
					fishing[8] = 4;
					fishing[1] = Item.fishing_fly_lvl[0];
					fishing[5] = 314;
					fishing[6] = 309;
					fishing[7] = 0x26E;
				} else {
					sendMessage("You need a "+GetItemName(309)+" and "+GetItemName(314)+" to fish here.");
			
			} else if (NPCID == 251) { /*Dragon Equips*/
				PutNPCCoords = true;
				WanneShop = 41;
		}[/code]

He won’t do anything. When I try shop NPCs, I dc.

Read full topic

item.title: (TestScape) Adding New Shops?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Did you put the last code in your NPC Click One/ Click Two packet?

Read full topic

item.title: (TestScape) Adding New Shops?
item.dc:creator: @hermitblade hermitblade
item.description:
@hermitblade wrote:

I need help adding new shops.

I’ve added King Arthur to autospawn.cfg and that was no problem.

spawn = 251	3250	3423	0	0	0	0	0	4	Dragon Weapons King Arthur

I’ve added my shop which I can open from an command but not King Arthur.

shop = 40	Dragon Weapons				2	2	1149	999	3140	999	4087	999	4585	999	1187	999	1215	999	1249	999	1305	999	1377	999	1434	999	3204	999	4587	999	6739	999	7158	999

I’ve added the code in client.java

if (NPCID == 251) { /*Dragon Equips*/ PutNPCCoords = true; openUpShop(40); }

Is there anything else I need to add or change? When I click on him, nothing happens.

Server IP - sugerscape.sytes.net
Server Port - 43594

I put my server info incase someone wants to see an example.

Read full topic
